New Records: The Detroit Tigers achieved a 3-0 victory over the Cleveland Guardians, evening their ALDS series 1-1.
Kerry Carpenter hit a three-run homer off Emmanuel Clase in the ninth inning, breaking the scoreless tie.
Key Match Events: The Tigers' ninth-inning three-run homer proved to be the turning point in the game.
The game ended with a 3-0 final score after eight scoreless innings.
Post-Match Reflections: The series is now tied 1-1 heading into Game 3.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game 3 will be played at Detroit's Comerica Park.
